title: Seikai no Danshou: Tanjou (Dub)
alternative_title: Crest of the Stars: Birth, 星界の断章 “誕生”
description: This is the story about how Dubus, Lafiel's father, and Plakia after an adventure on a mysterious, abandoned spaceship decided to have a daughter together and why Dubus gave her the name Lafiel.
